 */ /*eslint-disable */import esriConfig from'@arcgis/core/config';import OAuthInfo from'@arcgis/core/identity/OAuthInfo';import IdentityManager from'@arcgis/core/identity/IdentityManager';import{idManager}from'../api';/* eslint-enable */import{APP_ID,APP_PORTAL_URL}from'../constants/app-constants';import{GET_IDENTITY,SIGN_IN,SIGN_OUT,LOAD_PORTAL}from'../constants/action-types';esriConfig.portalUrl=APP_PORTAL_URL;var info=new OAuthInfo({appId:APP_ID,popup:false,portalUrl:APP_PORTAL_URL});IdentityManager.registerOAuthInfos([info]);/*
const response = await fetch('/server/api/authentication', {
  method: 'POST',
  headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', },
  body: JSON.stringify({ post: action.type }),
})*/ /**
 * Middleware function with the signature
 *
 * storeInstance =>
 * functionToCallWithAnActionThatWillSendItToTheNextMiddleware =>
 * actionThatDispatchWasCalledWith =>
 * valueToUseAsTheReturnValueOfTheDispatchCall
 *
 * Typically written as
 *
 * store => next => action => result
 */var arcgisMiddleWare=function arcgisMiddleWare(store){return function(next){return function(action){switch(action.type){case GET_IDENTITY:{next(action);idManager('checkSignInStatus')//return IdentityManager.checkSignInStatus(`${info.portalUrl}/sharing`)
.then(function(result){//console.log(result)
store.dispatch({type:LOAD_PORTAL});});}case SIGN_IN:{idManager('signIn');//IdentityManager.getCredential(`${info.portalUrl}/sharing`)
return next(action);}case SIGN_OUT:{idManager('signOut');//IdentityManager.destroyCredentials()
window.location.reload();return next(action);}default:{return next(action);}}};};};export default arcgisMiddleWare;
